original_text: where for forty days he was tempted by the devil. He ate nothing during those days, and at the end of them he was hungry.
korean_text: 마귀에게 시험을 받으시더라 이 모든 날에 아무 것도 잡수시지 아니하시니 날 수가 다하매 주리신지라

sentences.original_text: he was tempted by the devil
He ate nothing during those days
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 날들 동안 아무것도 먹지 않았다

sentences.original_text: and at the end of them
